attributes.action: We have lost all confidence in this government to handle the economy and defence and want a debate in parliament
attributes.additional_details: It is clear this governemnt in its present state has lost the ability to deal with the economy and is weakening our position in the UN and NATO  by making severe cuts in defence at the same time as spending £8,000,000,000 on overseas aid, a no confidence vote must be offered in the house
